org.springframework.web.reactive.config

接口 WebReactiveConfigurer

  • 所有已知实现类:
    WebReactiveConfigurerComposite

    public interface WebReactiveConfigurer
    Defines callback methods to customize the configuration for Web Reactive applications enabled via @EnableWebReactive.

    @EnableWebReactive-annotated configuration classes may implement this interface to be called back and given a chance to customize the default configuration. Consider implementing this interface and overriding the relevant methods for your needs.

    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Brian Clozel, Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 方法详细资料

      • configureContentTypeResolver

        default void configureContentTypeResolver(RequestedContentTypeResolverBuilder builder)
        Configure how the content type requested for the response is resolved.

        The given builder will create a composite of multiple RequestedContentTypeResolvers, each defining a way to resolve the the requested content type (accept HTTP header, path extension, parameter, etc).

        参数:
        builder - factory that creates a CompositeContentTypeResolver

      • addCorsMappings

        default void addCorsMappings(CorsRegistry registry)
        Configure cross origin requests processing.
        另请参阅:
        CorsRegistry

      • configurePathMatching

        default void configurePathMatching(PathMatchConfigurer configurer)
        Configure path matching options.

        The given configurer assists with configuring HandlerMappings with path matching options.

        参数:
        configurer - the PathMatchConfigurer instance

      • addResourceHandlers

        default void addResourceHandlers(ResourceHandlerRegistry registry)
        Add resource handlers for serving static resources.
        另请参阅:
        ResourceHandlerRegistry

      • addArgumentResolvers

        default void addArgumentResolvers(List<HandlerMethodArgumentResolver> resolvers)
        Provide custom controller method argument resolvers. Such resolvers do not override and will be invoked after the built-in ones.
        参数:
        resolvers - a list of resolvers to add

      • configureMessageReaders

        default void configureMessageReaders(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>> readers)
        Configure the message readers to use for decoding the request body where @RequestBody and HttpEntity controller method arguments are used. If none are specified, default ones are added based on WebReactiveConfigurationSupport.addDefaultHttpMessageReaders(java.util.List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>>).

        See extendMessageReaders(List) for adding readers in addition to the default ones.

        参数:
        readers - an empty list to add message readers to

      • extendMessageReaders

        default void extendMessageReaders(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageReader<?>> readers)
        An alternative to configureMessageReaders(List) that allows modifying the message readers to use after default ones have been added.

      • addFormatters

        default void addFormatters(org.springframework.format.FormatterRegistry registry)
        Add custom Converters and Formatters for performing type conversion and formatting of controller method arguments.

      • getValidator

        default Optional<org.springframework.validation.Validator> getValidator()
        Provide a custom Validator.

        By default a validator for standard bean validation is created if bean validation api is present on the classpath.

      • getMessageCodesResolver

        default Optional<org.springframework.validation.MessageCodesResolver> getMessageCodesResolver()
        Provide a custom MessageCodesResolver to use for data binding instead of the one created by default in DataBinder.

      • configureMessageWriters

        default void configureMessageWriters(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageWriter<?>> writers)
        Configure the message writers to use to encode the response body based on the return values of @ResponseBody, and ResponseEntity controller methods. If none are specified, default ones are added based on WebReactiveConfigurationSupport.addDefaultHttpMessageWriters(List).

        See extendMessageWriters(List) for adding writers in addition to the default ones.

        参数:
        writers - a empty list to add message writers to

      • extendMessageWriters

        default void extendMessageWriters(List<org.springframework.http.codec.HttpMessageWriter<?>> writers)
        An alternative to configureMessageWriters(List) that allows modifying the message writers to use after default ones have been added.

      • configureViewResolvers

        default void configureViewResolvers(ViewResolverRegistry registry)
        Configure view resolution for processing the return values of controller methods that rely on resolving a View to render the response with. By default all controller methods rely on view resolution unless annotated with @ResponseBody or explicitly return ResponseEntity. A view may be specified explicitly with a String return value or implicitly, e.g. void return value.
        另请参阅:
        ViewResolverRegistry
